database.name: VIEW ALMAC_CRM_SERVICIOS
database.view: SELECT p.m_product_id AS almac_crm_servicios_id, p.created, p.updated, p.updatedby, p.createdby, p.isactive, p.ad_org_id, p.ad_client_id, p.m_product_category_id, p.m_product_id, pc.value AS categoria_value, pc.name AS categoria_name, p.value AS servicio_value, p.name AS servicio_name, upper(COALESCE(p.em_almac_unidad, 'NA')) AS unidad, COALESCE(p.em_dmprod_preciofob, 0) AS costo_mxn, COALESCE(p.em_almac_fob_usd, 0) AS costo_usd, pesos.m_productprice_id AS precio_pesos_id, pesos.pricestd AS sugerido_mxn, pesos.pricelimit AS minimo_mxn, dolares.m_productprice_id AS precio_dolares_id, dolares.pricestd AS sugerido_usd, dolares.pricelimit AS minimo_usd, COALESCE(p.em_almac_desperdicio, 0) AS desperdicio FROM m_product p LEFT JOIN m_product_category pc ON pc.m_product_category_id = p.m_product_category_id AND p.producttype = 'S' LEFT JOIN (SELECT m_productprice.m_product_id, m_productprice.m_productprice_id, m_productprice.pricelist, m_productprice.pricestd, m_productprice.pricelimit FROM m_productprice WHERE m_productprice.m_pricelist_version_id = (((SELECT m_pricelist_version.m_pricelist_version_id FROM m_pricelist_version WHERE m_pricelist_version.m_pricelist_id = 'D7E173C07AF641D09904F751BEDDA9D8' ORDER BY m_pricelist_version.validfrom DESC LIMIT 1))) AND m_productprice.ad_client_id = '0BD13E24E0F94596B61414BD72225EB8') pesos ON p.m_product_id = pesos.m_product_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT m_productprice.m_product_id, m_productprice.m_productprice_id, m_productprice.pricelist, m_productprice.pricestd, m_productprice.pricelimit FROM m_productprice WHERE m_productprice.m_pricelist_version_id = (((SELECT m_pricelist_version.m_pricelist_version_id FROM m_pricelist_version WHERE m_pricelist_version.m_pricelist_id = '60ED95F187974529B7D8E36A58FBC210' ORDER BY m_pricelist_version.validfrom DESC LIMIT 1))) AND m_productprice.ad_client_id = '0BD13E24E0F94596B61414BD72225EB8') dolares ON p.m_product_id = dolares.m_product_id WHERE pc.ad_client_id = '0BD13E24E0F94596B61414BD72225EB8' AND p.producttype = 'S'
